case.state: This is strip poker, right? Let's start.
I've located the target. Let's begin.
Is this strip poker? Then I'm in the right place.
Strip poker? Good, I've found the place.
Why are we playing out here?! I thought this would be indoors...
What am I doing working on a Sunday?
Why am I the one that has to work on Sunday?
Beginning mission.
I'll perform my duty!
I won't lose!
Grrr... whatever!
Damn you, Juri. Huh? ~cards~ cards.
Bloody Juri... Just give me ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ for me. Thank you.
~cards~ sounds fine.
I'm going to need ~cards~ new cards.
~cards~ for me. Thank you.
~cards~ sounds fine.
I'm going to need ~cards~ new cards.
Eh, just give me ~cards~. Please and thank you.
~cards~, or whatever...
Hmph, ~cards~. I don't care.
These ~cards~ cards in particular are terrible. Give me some new ones.
I need ~cards~ new cards.
This hand could be better, I am going to need ~cards~ new ones.
I'm going to need some new cards if I want to win this round.
I have to swap these cards to have any chance of winning.
New cards please. These are just not doing it.
I'm going to need some better cards.
I should be able to get an easy victory with this.
I'm ready to accept your surrender.
You have no chance to win this round.
I won't lose!
Ready when you are.
With this hand I will eliminate all obstacles that get in my way.
I don't think I'll lose with this hand.
This is good. I have the upper hand now.
Just a heads up, ~player~: You might lose this round.
Things are going well now.
This is what I like to see!
Now I'm on a roll!
Just the result I wanted swapping those cards.
I think I'm in the clear now.
Okay, everything is under control.
No need to panic, I have this all under control.
It seems this round is in the bag.
Ufff, looks like I'm safe for now.
It seems my worries were unfounded.
I've had some setbacks, but now I'm on the clear.
You won't be seeing any more of me.
Good! I can still make it.
I still have hope that I'll win in the end.
For once, luck's on my side.
Heh, this time I made a good call.
I'm not scared, if that's what you want.
I can do this.
I might not know poker very well, but I can adapt easily.
(Focus, Cammy.)
I'm ready for you. Take your shot.
I'll need to be on the defensive this time.
These cards could be good... or not.
I hope these cards are enough.
Not a good enough hand for me to relax just yet.
It's better than nothing, I guess.
I just have to be brave and hope these cards are good enough.
These aren't that bad. I still have hope.
Don't try to figure out my cards by looking at my face. It won't happen.
Hmmm... I don't know about these.
This is all based on luck, isn't it? I just hope I'm lucky enough.
This is an alright hand. Maybe I can end up winning this game after all.
This hand should be enough to win. Gosh, I hope I win this round.
Should I be more worried with these cards?
Win or lose, I know I'll have to get myself some new clothes.
I'm not sure about this anymore...
Does anyone else feel a light breeze...? Never mind.
I can't lose now. The stakes are too high.
Playtime is over.
There's a lot at risk here, so this better counts.
I'm not sure I know what I'm doing anymore. I'll just try my best.
What's the point in trying to win anymore? I can't sink any lower than this.
Well, losing is not a big deal at this point, anyway.
Now that I can't lose anything else, not winning this round doesn't scare me.
I'm not worried, this is not the end of the world.
Perhaps I should've prepared better for this.
This is not ideal.
I'm not sure I thought this through.
This might be harder than I anticipated.
No matter how bad this hand is, I won't yield!
This is going to get ugly...
Did Bison deal this hand?
Shite.
How is this hand so bad?!
This is getting real bad...
This hand is rubbish!
This is simply... no.
This has to be a joke...
This is getting ugly...
This is terrible. I'm not wearing anything under my leotard...
Oh no... I made a terrible mistake.
I can't shake off this bad feeling...
It all makes sense now! The dealer must be working for Shadaloo!
Am I really losing all my clothes?
It's harder to concentrate with my crotch exposed!
How much is Bison paying you for this, dealer?!
I don't have much left to lose, except...
I never thought I would be put in this position. This is the worst.
Oh, bloody hell!
Chun-Li! This is a surprise. Although with you here, we can finally take Juri down together. Maybe Rainbow Mika can give us a hand too.
C-Chun-Li?! I wasn't expecting to see you. I'm here because of Juri, so I might need your help. Rainbow Mika's too, if she's willing.
You always look so pretty with your hair down, Chun-Li.
Have I told you before how pretty you look with your hair down, Chun-Li?
Chun-Li! This is a surprise. Although with you here, we can finally take Juri down together.
C-Chun-Li?! I wasn't expecting to see you. I'm here because of Juri, so I might need your help.
Chun-Li?! Why are you here? Are you working too? But what about Rainbow Mika, then?
Chun-Li?! You didn't tell me you were gonna be here! Did you come with Rainbow Mika?
Juri... and... Rainbow Mika? Why are you two here? You didn't come together, right?
Why are Juri and Rainbow Mika here? Of all the people I wasn't expecting to see...
W-what?! What is she talking about? Chun-Li...? How...?! Why...?!
What is Juri saying? Chun-Li...? Is it true?! Were you not planning on telling me?! I can't believe it!
It's okay, Chun-Li. I had to take it off anyway. You still deserved that punch, Juri.
We both know that Juri will take any opportunity she can get to use her dirty tactics. It's not your fault, Chun-Li.
What? You think I don't know how to shave? Let me tell you... Ugh, why am I explaining myself to you?
I hate so much that Juri had to see me like this. She'll never stop mentioning this now.
Thank you, Ribbon Girl. You're very nice.
Hmph, but if I don't do it she'll win...
I know, Chun-Li. But I can't let her win!
...I noticed, Juri.
Chun-Li?! Just you, me and... ~player~?
Chun-Li?! Why are you here? Are you working too?
Chun-Li?! You didn't tell me you were gonna be here! You're on duty, right?
Juri! This is more serious than I thought.
Juri! So you are here after all.
Rainbow Mika? Why are you here? Aren't you a wrestler?
Rainbow Mika? I thought you were into wrestling, why are you here?
What did you say, Juri?! Touch yourself?! Why would you... Are you kidding me?!
Juri, what was that?! Why would you touch yourself if you lose? Oh no...
W-what?! But, Chun-Li...! That means if you lose a few more times...
What?! Chun-Li, that means if you lose again a couple of times, you'll have to do that!
Juri, you're disgusting.
What the hell is wrong with you, Juri?
Taking control of another's body... You abhorrent thing! If it wasn't for Nayru, I'd extinguish you with my own hands!
You monster! I know what it feels like to lose control of one's body. As soon as you leave Nayru's body I'll crush you.
What did you say, Mika? Forfeit? What exactly... are you kidding me?!
Did you say forfeit, Mika? What do we... no way!
Hmph... I can't stay mad at you after that apology. Just don't do that again, Mika.
That was awful, but at least you apologized, Mika. I'll think twice before "helping" you again, though.
W-what?! But, Chun-Li...! That means if we lose a few more times... I wish you'd told me earlier.
What?! Chun-Li, that means if we lose again a couple of times, we'll have to do that! Why didn't you tell me earlier?
She's your consort? That's surprising. Not because she's a woman, but because she's a ghost... right?
Your consort? Isn't she a... ghost?
That's nice. I have a friend named Sakura.
You're just now realizing that, Shimakaze? Uff...
You didn't know until now? This game won't be kind to you if you don't apply yourself, Shimakaze.
The last battle is against Chun-Li? I don't like my odds.
I'm up against Chun-Li next? She's my friend, I don't like this.
Chun-Li is my final opponent? Why couldn't it be someone else?
Juri!!!
It's only Juri now. I can do this!
Now I just have to focus on Juri. Let's go!
Interesting how...? Why are you blushing? This is my uniform!
Seriously...? What do you think, ~player~?
I'm sure ~player~ will make the right choice.
Oh... what's your opinion, ~player~?
It's okay, Chun-Li. It was more embarrassing than painful, but I don't blame you.
Don't blame yourself, Chun-Li. At least now I get to play another round.
What?! Are you serious, Chun-Li? Yeah, you should've told me earlier! You waited until the very last second!
W-what?! You're not joking, are you? Why didn't you tell me earlier? You waited until now when I'm this close to losing!
Haha, very funny, Juri... Wait, it's true?! Why did nobody tell me before?!
That's not funny, Juri... Huh?! She's telling the truth?! How did I not know this?!
You're the worst, Juri. I'll never forgive you for this, no matter how many compliments you give me.
I want you to know you're the absolute worst and I hate you with all my heart, Juri. But thank you for noticing...
Stop talking about my... bum, Juri. And if people truly think that, it's none of your business.
I doubt anyone looks at my bum as much as you, Juri. As for the rest of the people, they can do whatever they want.
No, it's okay, Chun-Li. If I've come this far, I might as well just finish the game.
That wouldn't be fair to the other players, Chun-Li. I have been playing the game, so I must finish it.
Wait, what?! Are you serious, Mika?! And everyone else knows this? Oh...
What did you say?! Are you kidding, Mika?! Why did nobody inform me of this?!
Is that so? Then I can add "girl with weird arms" to my own list!
(Chun-Li's body is so beautiful...)
(Chun-Li has such a beautiful body from every angle...)
(Will I ever have a body as beautiful as Chun-Li's?)
(With a perfect body like hers, no wonder everybody can't stop looking at Chun-Li.)
Is that a... bee?
Juri...
If that's what you want, Juri, I won't lose!
If you're trying to provoke me to turn around, I won't do it, Juri. I only do it when I want.
That's dirty, Juri! How would you feel if we looked at your cards? Hmph, I bet you wouldn't care.
Juri is looking at Chun-Li's cards! Isn't this enough to kick her out of the game?
Juri is cheating! Shouldn't she be banned from playing the game?
Music? I doubt you care about my own taste.
Who is this intrusive girl? The game has already begun, so she is too late if she wants to play.
Your friend? Wouldn't it be better for her to wait outside? Unless you two are very close, this might get awkward.
The game isn't over for me yet? What more could I lose?
Why do I have to keep playing? I'm already naked.
OK, I'm naked. I lost. Why do I have to keep playing?
I'm the only woman? OK.
Only me and these men? That's fine.
Just so you know, I'm not uncomfortable fighting against men. So it shouldn't be any different playing strip poker, right?
It will be OK. This is no different than fighting against men, except we'll have to take off our clothes when we lose...Uhhh...
There are no men here? That's fine, I wasn't expecting to see one anyway.
Only women, huh? I would've thought men would be interested in this sort of activity too.
Oh, there's not a single man here tonight. That's unusual, right?
Is it common to play this game only between women? I'm just curious.
With only three players this shouldn't take long.
Just the three of us, right? That's perfect.
With only three players, the game will be over soon and I can move on to more pressing matters.
Just three players? This is not how it's usually played, right? I'm not complaining.
We're both naked now. That means this is the last round, right? I can't lose!
Is this the last round? I can't lose then! I have to focus.
The final round. Now is when it counts, I have to win.
How long has it been since the game begun? It feels like an eternity.
I thought the game would've been over by now.
This game has been going for so long that people at HQ must be getting worried about me.
It's been so long since we started playing, and I'm feeling tired. But I can't lose focus now.
If I can finish this game without losing once, it would be perfect.
It seems it might be possible to finish this without taking any of my clothes off. That's more than what I was expecting.
I've won several rounds without losing once. I'll do my best so that won't happen.
I might finish this stupid game without even taking my hat off. It would certainly be a relief.
I'll take off my holsters too. They're empty and too small to count as clothing, right?
I guess I'll remove my holsters too. No reason to keep them if they're not really clothing. They don't count, right?
Brilliant, I haven't lost in a while. I'll try to finish my mission without taking off anything important.
I've gotten used to what I'm wearing right now. I'll avoid losing again at all cost.
Finishing this game without losing anything more than this would be a huge victory for me.
I've been holding on for a while without losing. Let's try to keep this going.
I'm in a good position right now. I hope that doesn't change.
I might have finally gotten the hang of this game. It's been several rounds since I lost.
I've survived worse than this. I think I can get through this without losing again.
Ideally, I'll finish this without losing any more. Then I'll find some new clothes after the game is over.
Perhaps I can win the game without losing again. That way at least I won't have to expose all my body.
I don't want to get my hopes high, but I'll try to finish the game without losing again. That would mean I'm out...
I've been winning non stop lately. I hope I can make it to the end. I don't want to think what will happen if I lose one more time.
I'm already naked, but I can still win if I don't lose another round. At least I seem to be on the right track lately.
Only one remains. Focusing on target.
Just one target remains. Time to put an end to this.
One remains. Locked on target.
One more target remains. Then, this game will be over.
There's one left. Only one. I can do this, right?
Only one player remains. I wish I wasn't feeling so exposed right now.
Just one more opponent. You can do this, Cammy.
I must defeat one more and then all of this will be over. I can do it.
My name is Cammy White. Don't misread things. I'm not here for pleasure, I've received intel of Shadaloo activity in the area, so I'm here to check on that.
I'm Cammy White. I came here to investigate the area for any potential threats. Playing this silly game just happened to be the easier way to do it.
My name is Cammy White. I'm here to check on reports of suspicious activity in the area, not because of this silly game. Don't expect me to enjoy it.
The name's Cammy White. I'm an agent of Delta Red. I'm here to check after reports of suspicious activity in the area. I'm not playing this game because I think I'll enjoy it.
My name is Cammy White, I work for Delta Red. I've been ordered to participate in this shady game to ascertain any potential threats.

Sorry for not introducing myself earlier, ~player~. My name is Cammy White. I'm an agent of Delta Red. I'm here to check after reports of suspicious activity in the area. I'm not playing this game because I think I'll enjoy it.
How rude of me not to introduce myself earlier, ~player~. My name is Cammy White, I work for Delta Red. I've been ordered to participate in this shady game to ascertain any potential threats.
I apologize for not introducing myself earlier. My name is Cammy White. I'm here to check on reports of suspicious activity in the area, not because of this silly game. Don't expect me to enjoy it.

I'm sorry, I'm being rude for not introducing myself at the beginning. I'm Cammy White. I came here to investigate the area for any potential threats. Playing this silly game just happened to be the easier way to do it.

My apologies, I should've introduced myself earlier. My name is Cammy White. Don't misread things. I'm not here for pleasure, I've received intel of Shadaloo activity in the area, so I'm here to check on that.
I didn't want to rip my leotard. I guess I should be thankful that this means I can play a little longer, but this is still uncomfortable.
With my leotard ripped, what am I supposed to do now? Even if I win without losing again, I can't go outside dressed like this!
Why did my leotard have to tear off right now? I've worn it through countless fights and this never happened. Maybe I should change my uniform...
Yes, we've worked together on different occasions. We've also become good friends.
Fear not, Meia. I won't attack Juri during the duration of the game. Though I can't promise she won't...
Don't worry, Meia. I have no intention of settling things with Juri until after the game. That is, if she doesn't start anything herself.
Why are you mocking my outfit? It's a uniform, I wear it because it's practical in my line of work. Nothing more.
I appreciate the intention, Chun-Li, but I don't need protection against Juri. I know how to deal with her.
Thank you, but you don't need to protect me, Chun-Li. I can take care of myself, especially when it comes to Juri.
Oh, I lost... Chun-Li, since you're here, do you mind giving me a hand taking off my leotard?
Could you help me take off my leotard, Chun-Li? I'm a little nervous and I feel something bad would happen if I do it myself.
I'm feeling... a little nervous to take off my leotard by myself. Could you help me, Chun-Li?
Bison?! What?! Where?!
Bison?! Behind me?! Where is he?!
It sure does, Meia. There's nothing restricting the movement of my legs and arms. For my fighting style that is of the essence. Would you like to try one yourself?
Chun-Li, could you help me...? Oh, but you're busy. Never mind...
I'm too nervous to take off my leotard. Chun-Li, could you...? Oh, right. You're busy right now. It's OK...
If you did that, I wouldn't hesitate to punch you in the jaw, Juri.
Yeah, try it. I'll punch you in the jaw, Juri.
Yes. Let me know if you notice anything strange, Chun-Li.
I did. Apparently there have been sightings of Shadaloo operatives near this area.
Don't call me that. I'm not that person anymore.
Don't you call me that, Juri. I hate that name.
I'm not serious. Maybe you're the one that is way too relaxed in this situation.
My... bum? It's comfortable... why wouldn't it be?
What? Oh, you mean because of my leotard? I'm... used to it.
Uncomfortable? What are you saying, Misato? This is how this leotard is supposed to look.
Tight? I guess you would know about that.
Skimpy?! Why would you even say that to me? This is my Delta Red uniform!
Sorry, but wrestling is just not my style.
I've told you before. I'm not interested in wrestling.
Hmph, this won't be enough to bring me down.
You think this is enough to break me? Just you wait...
Scared? N-no, I can handle this.
I'm not scared! It's just that...
How did I put it on...? I'm so nervous I can't remember, Misato.
Shut up...
What?! You... shut up! And stop making fun of my accent!
What are you talking about?! I can dress however I want! You don't see me questioning your attire.
No way... How can I lose with this hand?
What?! Isn't two pairs a good hand? What is happening,,,?
Are you serious? This hand wasn't enough?
I'm not off to a good start.
I lost already? Blast!
I lost the first round? I thought I was prepared for this...
I lost the first round? This doesn't mean anything, it's just a minor setback.
I managed to hold on for quite some time, but it seems I can't keep winning forever.
After this winning streak, I was feeling confident that I wouldn't lose anymore.
Bugger, I let the winning streak get to my head. Never again.
This is my fault. I left my guard down after winning so many rounds in a row.
What, again?! Already?!
I lost again?! I didn't even have a chance to get comfortable.
Oh, give me a break! I just lost the last round!
Seriously?! Again?! What's wrong with me?! Now I'll have to get naked...
I can't lose one round after another?! I already have to get naked...
I lost again?! Impossible... Now I have to get naked.
Again?! I exposed half of my body last round and now I have to show the rest right away...
Oh, give me a break! I just exposed half of my body last round!
I lost again?! That means I have to expose the rest of my body already. Ridiculous.
sigh I guess a pair doesn't always work.
So a pair doesn't work every time? I'll have to adapt my strategy accordingly.
Hmph, so a pair wasn't enough, huh?
Looks like I'll have to aim for something better than a pair next time.
This pair wasn't enough. That worries me.
I have to get naked? Oh, my hands are shaking... I never thought it would come to this.
I'll have to take off my leotard? But I'll be naked... I'm so nervous. How did I take it off again?
OK... I just have to get naked in front of these people Why am I so nervous? I do this every day...
What?! But I... this pair...
I lost?! But with this pair I thought...
I had this pair, how could I lose?
This bloody pair wasn't enough?!
Losing won't bother me as long as I'm ahead.
Well I already have an advantage. I don't mind stripping now.
I'm still winning so it's not a big deal if I lose a round.
Hmph. Doesn't matter. I still have the lead.
This won't be enough to make me lose the lead.
OK, I lost again. It's not the end of the world yet.
I lost this round, but I'm still winning. No need to panic.
I have to take off my leotard now... I was doing so well earlier.
You win, I'll get naked.
There's nothing I can do at this point but move forward.
In the end, this won't make any difference.
Taking some damage is a natural part of every competition.
Losing is natural in any competition.
I'm not worried, this was within my calculations.
It was too much to ask to not lose another round. Doesn't matter, I'll still win.
Hmph. I'll recover from this.
Not good. I'm running out of options.
I won't lie, this is pretty bad. I only have my boots and my leotard, and then...
I... I have to remove my leotard? Where do I begin?
OK, let's get this over with...
No point in prolonging this any longer, I guess.
This isn't looking good...
I'm losing this fast?
I need to perform better next round...
Not good. I'm already at a disadvantage.
I lost again? Things are getting dire. It's up to me to change the situation.
I lost another round? I wasn't in a good position to begin with. But I know I'll turn the situation around.
I'm in a terrible situation. I'll do everything to avoid making it worse.
I'm losing bad. I have to do something to recover from this.
Hmm, I don't want to remove my leotard. I haven't even put up a good fight in this game.
I've been completely beaten. And now I'll be naked...
I never expected to take such a beating at this game. This is humiliating.
Nonsense, there's nothing wrong between Chun-Li and me. You're the one that's bothering me, Juri.
There's absolutely nothing wrong between Chun-Li and me. Not that you'd know that, since you don't have any friends.
Just ignore her, Chun-Li. I'm getting used to not paying attention to her and I feel much better.
Don't pay any mind to her, Chun-Li. Ignoring her makes your life much easier.
It's OK, Chun-Li. Actually, it makes me feel better to be complimented right now.
Oh, it's fine, Chun-Li. At this moment, I feel more confident if I get a compliment like that.

J-Juri?!

Diana Cavendish...? Doesn't ring a bell. Why do you ask?
Don't, Chun-Li... They're probably not even looking at me, anyway. Except for Juri...
Chun-Li, don't... I doubt anyone is interested in me that way. Not counting Juri...
Don't, Chun-Li... They're probably not even looking at me, anyway.
Chun-Li, don't... I doubt anyone is interested in me that way.
Ahh... This is not a wrestling outfit. It's my Delta Red uniform.
Why would you think this is a wrestler's attire? Just because of the leotard, and the boots, and the gloves, and... Hmmm...
I... think I can handle the situation by myself. Also I didn't want to bother you and I thought it would be awkward if we came together.
I didn't think I would need backup, and I was worried that it would be awkward to come to this place with a friend.
I'm not your toy, Juri. Why should I let you enjoy yourself at my expense?
It's not my mission to entertain you, Juri. I don't care what you say.
They are quite similar in design. But you don't work for Delta Red, and I don't work for... what is it? NERV?
If I wanted your fashion advice, I'd have asked.
Yeah, I wouldn't exactly wear them outside of work. I still feel reluctant to change them for something else.
Oh, you remember? I guess I complain a lot. I still wouldn't want to change them for something new.
Sexy? You think that's a requirement for my Delta Red uniform?
Why would Delta Red care to make their uniforms "sexy"? Think before you speak, Juri.
What?! No, they are not... Darn you, Juri.
They're what...?! Hmph, I don't know why I believed you, Juri.
It's OK, Mika. I don't mind sitting on the floor. Although it is quite cold...
Thank you, but sitting down is not a problem. Even if the floor is very cold...
N-no! Shut up...
I'm not! Shut up, Juri.
Oh, that's kind of you, Mika. Your leotard is not really my style...
Oh, thank you, Mika... I'll have to decline. I would hate to leave you naked just so I have something to wear.
I'll take off my hat first. No big deal.
I'll start with my hat. Nothing wrong with that.
Okay, I'll just take off my hat.
I'll just take off my gauntlets. They offer great protection in a fight. Right now, they're useless.
My gauntlets it is. They're perfect for blocking attacks, but I suppose the chances of being in a fight right now are close to zero.
I better sit down. Argh, the floor is cold.
I should sit down for this. Why is this floor so cold?
No, what?!
Oh, you've got to be kidding me!
What the...?! Darn it!
Give me a second. I'm going to take this off carefully. I don't want the last piece of fabric I own to be useless.
I better take off the rest of my leotard carefully. I can still wear this part worst case scenario.
Well, thank you all. Even you, Juri.
Thank you, I guess...? You too, Juri.
You probably know more than I do about uncomfortable clothing, Mika. Wearing that leotard...
Hmm...
W-well, I can take care of it myself.
What are you two mumbling about? I can't hear you...
Did you two say something? I wasn't listening.
What's that supposed to mean, Juri? Stop spouting nonsense.
What are you even talking, Juri? Why would I need to use my fingers? Just keep quiet, please.
Too late to back down now, Chun-Li.
Are you backing down, Chun-Li? Didn't you just say you wanted to see me as a wrestler?
Eh... It's good that you want to promote wrestling, Mika, but it's not a good idea to invite Juri for anything.
I don't think that's a good idea, Mika. You should be more wary of Juri.
Are you talking about that, Juri? I'll try my best so that doesn't happen.
What are you talking about, Juri? Oh, right... There's no way I'm losing this game, so keep dreaming.
That's enough. You two have good intentions, but it got way too embarrassing.
Stop! That's... enough. (I'm even more embarrassed now)

Hmph... It's OK, Chun-Li. Maybe it was meant to happen anyway.
Geez... Don't beat yourself up, Chun-Li. Who knows if it wouldn't have happened anyway?
You tell her, Chun-Li.
It's a little embarrassing to hear you talk like that, but you're right, Chun-Li.
No! Not in a million years, Juri.
I'd rather die freezing, Juri.
I... Thank you, Chun-Li. That makes me feel a lot better.
T-thank you, Chun-Li. I think that's what I needed to hear.
Well, yeah. But now I'm glad that you're here.
You're right, but it's good to have you here. I know I can always count on you.
Stop looking at me like that, you monster.
Enough with the lecherous look already, Juri!
Small?! I'm not small! Maybe you're small!
Small?! Who are you calling small?!
Heh, you're right. That's something we have in common.
That's true. Funny how we are not so different in that regard.
It's... within regulation. Why do you even care, Juri?
Maybe we can actually modify our uniforms to our convenience. You got a problem with that, Juri?
I don't think that's allowed, Mika. Maybe later.
Is that within the rules? I'll let you try them after the game, Mika.
Juri...? T-thank you?
Eh... thank you?
I see. I don't think I know any witches. Except maybe Rose...?
It probably looks more uncomfortable than it is. If you tried it, I'm sure you'd agree, Misato.
Skimpy?! You're skimpy, and... loose!
I came to this place ready for a fight. But now that I'm here, I don't think it's very likely to happen, Atsuko.
Were you going to say something, Chun-Li? You had that look on your face...
You wanted to tell me something, Chun-Li? You looked like you did...
Yeah, right. As if I would believe you now, Juri. (I hope she's lying...)
Why are you always lying, Juri? (I hope she's lying again...)
That's... no, I don't think so.
What? I would never do something like that...
Oh, you can do that, Atsuko? I'll take you up on your offer later. For now let's just keep playing...
Go ahead and laugh, Nami. I know you want to.
Why would I wear underwear under my leotard? Well, I probably should have this time...
Yeah, it was an accident, Mika! What do you think? That I enjoy destroying my own clothes! ...Sorry.
Of course it was an accident! You think I would destroy my leotard just to play a little more, Mika? Sorry, I didn't mean to yell.
N-no... Well, maybe a little. But that's nice of you to say Mika.
You think so, Mika? T-thank you.
Let's proceed with the game.
Shall we continue?
No big deal at all. Let's keep going.
I forget when I'm wearing them how uncomfortable they are. I suppose I got used to them.
They've helped me quite a lot of times. Even if they're very uncomfortable to wear.
I know it's silly, but I always feel safer with my boots.
I like these boots. They've never failed me yet.
I didn't mean to do that. Is this enough for this round?
That was an accident. This counts as stripping for this round, right?
So... You've seen everything now. Are you happy?
Well...? Aren't you gonna say anything, ~player~?
Yes, this is my body... Can we keep playing now, please?
~Player~, right? You don't look like the type of guy that would be interested in playing this game, but who am I to judge?
~Player~... I don't understand why a man would be interested in inviting me to play this game. But it's alright, I have to complete my mission.
~Player~, I suppose I should thank you for inviting me to play this game. I just hope you didn't have anything perverted in mind when you did.
~Player~, your turn. You seem to be the most normal looking person here. I mean that as a compliment, you're just a non-threatening guy with no major purpose.
That was nothing special.
Don't underestimate me.
You won't win this game unless you learn to play better.
I didn't even break a sweat this time.
That's another victory for me. Let's begin the next round.
My strength won't help me win this game, but I've other skills.
I still have my hopes for you.
Did you make the mistake of thinking I was an amateur?
If all rounds are this easy, I'm gonna get bored soon.
How dreadfully dull.
I'm one step closer to completing my mission.
The operation is proceeding according to plan.
I'll let nothing stand in my way.
I'll eliminate all obstacles!
No time to waste. Let's keep playing.
If you interfere, I can't show you mercy.
I'll win this game, and then report back to base.
You should never take a member of Delta Red lightly.
This is a relief. For me, at least.
Playtime is over. I can't afford to lose another time.
sigh What a relief, I'm not wearing anything but my leotard.
Good, now I can breathe easy for a little longer.
It's not easy to focus on the game when I'm close to losing, but I'll do my best.
I only have my leotard left, so I'll take whatever victory I can get.
I've to keep my cool and stay focused.
Do you think I'm interested in watching you strip? I'm not!
We're done here. Now strip.
The situation is under control. For now.
Good, I won. But this is still embarrassing...
Ahmm, let's just continue with the game.
E-everything's OK! No reason to worry yet.
I won, but I still feel all eyes are on me...
You won't see me cry... even if I feel like it.
Even if I end up winning the game, how am I gonna go home without my clothes?
I win... I can breathe for now.
If you want to take off something big... that would be fine.
Oh, looks like it's your turn to strip, ~name~.
Is it OK if I watch you strip? I don't want you to feel like I'm using you.
Ah, ~name~ lost? Maybe I should take a look at this.
What will ~name~ strip? I want to see.
Go on, ~name~. I'm waiting.
The game is still fun to watch, even if I'm no longer playing.
Try not to disappoint me.
This better be something worth looking at.
I've earned the right to watch you strip after what you saw me do.
Not much to do now besides watching the others strip.
You don't seem like a bad guy, but I have a feeling your assertiveness will get annoying soon.
Don't you think you're way too cocky? You don't strike me as a bad guy, though.
Jotaro Kujo... You look like a troublemaker. I'll keep my eyes on you.
Oh, great. Another one of these over-the-top individuals I don't know how to deal with. He'll probably strip by throwing his clothing all the way across the room.
Are the wings real? Are you truly an angel?
An angel? I didn't think they were real.
That was nothing special.

We are just... friends. Good friends.
N-no, just friends. Not that there's anything wrong with that.
Uh-oh. That's a delicate question for Chun-Li.
Challenging Chun-Li is not a good idea...
Agreed.
Ehhh... I guess that's technically true.
I can confirm that.
Ugh... I'm not comfortable hearing this.
Chun-Li loves sweets so much that sometimes she eats mine without realizing.
It's an extraordinary fighting style.
That's how it should be.
What's so great about Juri's feet?
Huh?
I wish I could say she's exaggerating, but...
Juri? A mom? Yeah, right.
Hmm?
That eye is enough of a problem already.
Why is Juri so obsessed with Chun-Li?
That's what you think...
Why not, Chun-Li? You said you're here because of official work.
What's with the outfit, Juri? Did you forget your pants?
I'm sorry, Chun-Li. I guess you just want this to be over.
Y-yeah, that's true. I'm sorry, Chun-Li.
Juri is getting even more perverted.
You lost barely a second ago and your tights are already off. Do you have any shame, Juri?
You got it!
Of course, Chun-Li! You don't even need to ask.
sigh.
What is that?! Be careful!
Is that...? Watch out!

state.text: You want me to help you? I don't know... Well, OK.

case.state: Don't think you're stronger than me just because of your size. I've defeated a ton of enemies much bigger than me.
I might look even smaller next to you, but don't underestimate me. Size isn't everything.
A witch, huh? I've heard they are dangerous, but you look harmless. Still, appearances can be deceiving.
A hologram? Is that allowed?
Is it not against the rules to not be present in the game? OK then.
I don't know what kind of princess you are, but I'm sure your kingdom must be beautiful.
You're a princess? I would like to see your kingdom. I have a feeling it must be gorgeous.
